videos.description: ESPN Steelers reporter Jeremy Fowler gives a game ball to QB Ben Roethlisberger for relieving Landry Jones while ESPN Browns reporter Pat McManamon awards his game ball to QB Johnny Manziel for his performance in Pittsburgh's 30-9 win.
videos.headline: Roethlisberger, Manziel get game balls
